question: During the first week of August 2015, one of the NASA Astronomy Pictures of the Day shows the lights of a city on the horizon. The namesake of this city also has a landmark building in Chicago named after him. What is the name of the architectural firm that designed this landmark building? Give the first name appearing in the name of the firm as of June 2023.

trajectory.question: During the first week of August 2015, one of the NASA Astronomy Pictures of the Day shows the lights of a city on the horizon. The namesake of this city also has a landmark building in Chicago named after him. What is the name of the architectural firm that designed this landmark building? Give the first name appearing in the name of the firm as of June 2023.

trajectory.actor_reasoning: I need to identify the specific APOD from early August 2015 showing city lights and trace the namesake to a Chicago landmark and its architect.

args.query: site:apod.nasa.gov August 2015 APOD city lights on the horizon

tool_executed.name: web_search
tool_executed.result:
Found 3 relevant web results:

1. 2015 August 21 - Sprites from Space - APOD
   URL: https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap150821.html
   Site: apod.nasa.gov
   Date: Aug 21, 2015
   Summary: Below, city lights and lightning flashes from thunderstorms appear over southern Mexico. The snapshot also captures the startling apparition ...

2. 2015 August 3 - A Proton Arc Over Lake Superior - APOD
   URL: https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/ap150803.html
   Site: apod.nasa.gov
   Date: Aug 3, 2015
   Summary: In the featured image, the yellow lights on the horizon are the city lights of Marquette, Michigan, USA. The blue and yellow rocks in the ...

3. Astronomy Picture of the Day Archive 2015 - NASA
   URL: https://apod.nasa.gov/apod/archivepix.html
   Site: apod.nasa.gov
   Summary: This archive list links to previous daily APOD pages from the current date through January 1, 2015. An archive of all existing APOD pages (current date through ...

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
Thoughts: The August 3, 2015 APOD shows Marquette, Michigan. The city’s namesake, Jacques Marquette, is honored by Chicago’s Marquette Building, designed by Holabird & Roche. The firm’s name as of June 2023 is Holabird & Root, so the first name in the firm’s name is Holabird.

FINAL ANSWER: Holabird

args.query: Marquette Building Chicago designed by firm Holabird Roche or Holabird & Root first name
